description: The root model. A model of all models. Your home.

Reality.description: A project/system with its own BAM model

nodes.label: BAM
nodes.description: Tool for generating and maintaining models of complex systems. Creates sketch from artifacts (designs, specs, measurements). Everyone works through the model.

nodes.label: RF Semiconductor
nodes.description: RF semiconductor system. Model includes: amplifiers, filters, mixers, interconnects. Linked to schematics, layouts, S-parameters, measurement data. Everyone on the project uses the model as their shared workspace.

intent.goal: Model as close to physical reality as possible

nodes.label: Reality is Part of the Model
nodes.description: Models embed reality via source references with hashes. Drift is detected automatically.

nodes.label: Intent vs Reality
nodes.description: Nodes without source = goals. Nodes with source = current state. Delta = work to do.

nodes.label: Self-Containing Models
nodes.description: Each reality contains its own model. The model lives inside what it describes.

nodes.label: Model as Workspace
nodes.description: Everyone on the project works through the model. It's not documentation - it's the interface to reality. Changes to reality are reflected in the model. The model is the shared truth.
